entry.tran: 海洋的；大洋的；大海的；与海洋有关的
entry.def: Oceanic means belonging or relating to an ocean or to the sea.

example.tran: 很多海洋岛屿都是因火山活动而形成的。

means.word_mean: 1. relating to or occurring or living in or frequenting the open ocean;
2. resembling the ocean in apparent limitlessness in extent or degree;
3. constituting or living in the open sea;

auth_sentence.content: They also occur on a number of oceanic islands.
